comment: First sowing. Sowed quite densely, left on window sill. £2.89 Mr. Fothergill's 'Oh Sow Simple - Musselburgh' 150 seeds. John Innes seed compost
Bedfordshire Champ. £0.89 Thompson Morgan 250 seeds. Sown in cells, 6 seeds per cell. John Innes seed compost
Brunswick red onion, sown same as Bedfordshire Champ. £2.99 200 seeds - The Seed Shed. John Innes seed compost [£12.99/35l local shop]
Second sowing - same conditions as first
Brunswick Red - No germination - tossed out
Bedfordshire Champ Second sowing - same conditions as first
Bedfordshire Champ *first* sowing: became 'leggy' on w/sill. Trimmed off ~4cm - moved to coldframe
